text: Sneek (Frisian: Snits) is a city in Friesland, in the Netherlands. In history, it is well known. The legendary warrior Pier Gerlofs Donia, fought a battle there. He is buried in the town in the Grote of Martinikerk. Since 2011, it has been part of the new municipality of Súdwest-Fryslân. Category:21st- century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Cities in Friesland Category:Former municipalities of Friesland Category:Súdwest-Fryslân
title: Sneek
